english_translation: Gold is in the stone, sweet butter is in the milk
The Ātma (Soul) is in the body, without showing itself a little.

kannada_original: ಇರಲಿ ದೈವದ ಚಿಂತೆ, ಅದು ದಿವ್ಯ ಆನಂದ ;
english_transliteration: Irali daivada chinte, adu divya ānanda;
english_translation: Let there be thought of the Divine (Daiva), that is divine bliss (Ānanda);
The bliss of emancipation (Kaivalya) is happiness – Muddu Rama.
